Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a solitary #Cow#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #3 Deku Scrubs#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Requiem of Spirit#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LH (Lab).text: They say Goron fabrics protect against more than fire.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
